# Release Checklist

## Pre-Release

- [ ] All planned features merged
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] ChangeLog updated
- [ ] Version numbers updated in CMakeLists.txt and configure.ac

## Version Update

Current version: `vX.Y.Z`

Update to: `vX.Y.Z`

## Post-Release

- [ ] Tag created and pushed
- [ ] GitHub Actions workflow completed successfully
- [ ] Release created on GitHub
- [ ] All artifacts uploaded (Linux GCC, Linux Clang, Windows, macOS)
- [ ] Release announcement (if applicable)
